Subject: EPP Software Updates Loop
Description:
Hi Support,

I'm attempting to apply EPP Server 5.9.3.0 and EPP Server Hotfix 1.1 to my EPP appliance. Although I receive a notification indicating the update was successful, I am still prompted to download and install the updates when I check for updates again.

Could you please advise on how to resolve this issue?

Thank you,
Giancarlo
